name: Master of Advanced Rites
text:
Each of the following effects can be used once per turn. If you use this Skill, you cannot Normal or Special Summon any monsters except Ritual Monsters until the end of your next turn.
● Return 1 Normal Monster in your hand to the Deck. Then, add 1 "Advanced Ritual Art" from your Deck to your hand.
● Select 1 Normal Monster and 1 Ritual Spell Card in your Graveyard and return them to your Deck.
